Quick search

Macros¶

Set of functions that should simplify the ambient noise study through simple and powerful Macros that avoid any programming effort.

@author: Eraldo Pomponi

@copyright: The MIIC Development Team (eraldo.pomponi@uni-leipzig.de)

@license: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 3 (http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html)

BlockCanvas oriented¶

recombine_corr_data Correlation matrix creation.
vchange_estimate Velocity change estimation macro.
vchange_estimate_multi_ref Velocity change estimation macro.
create_plots_macro Velocity change and related correlation curve images creation.
one_step_vchange_estimate_and_plot One step function to do the velocity change estimation and plot
plot_corr_matrix Plot all correlation matrixes stored in a folder as .mat file
plot_dvs_macro Plot all correlation matrixes stored in a folder as .mat file
real_vchanges_tomograpy Simple tomography obtained using also matplotlib BaseMap (experimental)
